title: 820-00244 Battery
message:
this laptop has been to two repair stores and apple store as well. they couldn't figure out why the screen is blank. The customer sends to me and I've fixed under 5min. cover the LCD port's pin with a tape.

boot to OSX fine but the battery status sometimes goes "normal" then a few moments later become "replace now" then goes back to "normal" is it just a bad battery??

title: 820-00244 Battery
message:
can i use 2015 battery?

2015 = 7.55 V, 39.71wh
2016 = 7.56 V, 41.41wh



edit.# yes 2015 battery works fine in 2016 MBr.
